column3: hu me mbɔbɔr dɛ mbrɛ w'adɔyɛ tse: Dɛ mbrɛ wo mbɔbɔrhu no dodow tse no pepa me mbrato."

column2: "Hohor mo ho koraa fi m'emumuyɛ mu
column3: Na tsew mo ho fi mo bɔn mu."

column2: "Na muhu me mbrato: Na mo bɔn wɔ m'enyim daa."

column3: woara nkotsee na mayɛ bɔn etsia wo
column4: Na mayɛ dza ɔyɛ mbusu wɔ w'enyi do: Dɛm ntsi sɛ ekasa a

column3: wɔwoo me wɔ emumuyɛ mu; Na bɔn mu na me na nyinseen me."
ɔwo epɛ nokwar a ɔwɔ akoma mu: Na no mu ehuntsae mu na ebɛma mehu nyansa."
na mo ho befir: Guar me
column4: na mo ho bɔhoa asen esukwankyɛba."

column3: Ama mbiew a ɔwo ebubu no no eedzi ehurusi."

column2: "Yi w'enyi fi mo bɔn ho huntsa

column3: bɔ akoma a no mu tsew ma me
column4: Na yɛ akoma a ɔtsen fofor wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Mma nntow me mmfi w'enyim nnkyen; Na nnyi wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ sunsum no mmfi mo mu."
"Fa wo nkwagye ho enyigye no san ma me bio: Na fa ɔpɛ sunsum suo mo mu."
"Nna mebɛkyerɛkyerɛ mbratofo w'akwan; Na ndzebɔnyɛfo bɛdan aba wo nkyɛn."

column4: yi me fi bɔgya ho asodzi mu; Na me tɛkyerɛma atow wo tsenenee ho huro ndwom."

column3: bue m'anofamfa; Na memfa m'ano nyi w'ayɛyi nkyerɛ."

column2: "Na ɔwo ammpɛ afɔrbɔ; nkyɛ mobɔbɔ: Ɔwo innyi akɔndɔ wɔ hyew afɔr mu."

column3: afɔr a epɛ nye sunsum bobɔe: Ao
column5: akoma a abobɔ na abotow no

column2: "Yɛ Zion yie wɔ w'enyisɔ pa no mu; Tow Jerusalɛm afasu no."

column3: ɔhyew afɔr na ɔhyew afɔr mu: Nna wɔdze anantwisaa bɔkɔ w'afɔrmbukyia do."
